amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase IDEA funding by $200 million and reduce funding for the GEAR UP program by $200 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in the Congressional Record to increase the appropriation for IDEA funding by $200 million from $500 million to $700 million by cutting the appropriation for GEAR UP by $200 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bass amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 98 - 319 (Roll no. 259).
